title: Ep 143 - Swan Song
description: On today's show, Todd has some news to share with the guys about his new cop podcast that he has been putting a lot of time into, and some of his plans for his standup comedy over the coming weeks. The guys also discuss a scientist electing to have brain surgery in order to try and cure his alcoholism, and whether or not the surgery got the job done, and Digs and Zito get into a few more battles of wits. The guys also discuss their favorite Super Bowl commercials, chat about the new HBO documentary series McMillion$, dealing with the McDonald's Monopoly scandal, they get into some Steven Seagal related Fact or Fiction, talk about their healthy eating habits as of late, and cover everything else they can think of, plus Pat stops by to get an update on everything and check in with everybody. It's a hilarious episode that none of us will forget. Come and have a good time with us.
dc:creator: The Pod
